snippet: The front wheels have lifted off the runway. Now, Americans are waiting to see if the economy can truly get aloft.
abstract: Economic recovery seems finally to be reaching American workers, with report that the unemployment rate and the number of jobless fell in January to the lowest levels since early 2009; despite the promising numbers, various indicators create an ambiguous picture of the overall economic recovery.
lead_paragraph: The front wheels have lifted off the runway. Now, Americans are waiting to see if the economy can truly get aloft.

headline.seo: January Jobs Report Reflects Hope a Recovery Is Blooming
headline.main: Job Gains Reflect Hope a Recovery Is Blooming
headline.print_headline: Job Gains Reflect Hope A Recovery Is Blooming
